text: haey nowpel del anakneasar ban tow chuob saou lai mean ( cheamuoynung chomnoun teangnih) keat ban pol tha tae puok anakaphdal tropy sa mb tde teangnih aoy khnhom ryy? te avei del a l laoh ban bratan aoy khnhom ku brasaer cheang avei del trong ban bratan aoy puok anak towtiet . phtoy towvinh puok anak te del sabbayrikreay nung chomnoun delke phdal aoy puok anak noh
